Error.requestIncomplete: The request could not be completed.
Error.unsavedToken: Unable to save login credentials for next time
Error.cantLogout: Unable to log out the user
Error.loadingUser: Unable to load your data. Some contacts and letters may be unavailable until you refresh.
Error.cantLoadMail: Unable to load this piece of mail
Error.unableToUploadContactPicture: Unable to upload the new contact picture. Ensure you are connected to the internet and try again.
Error.unableToUploadProfilePicture: Unable to upload the new profile picture. Ensure you are connected to the internet and try again.
Error.unableToUploadLetterPhoto: Unable to upload the attached image. Ensure you are connected to the internet and try again.
Error.uploadImageTimeout: The request timed out while uploading the image. Ensure you are connected to the internet and try again.
Error.cantSendMailModalBody: But don’t worry! Your draft is safe and sound. Our support team will help you fix the problem.
Error.cantAddContactBody: But don’t worry! Our support team will help you fix the problem.
Error.tooManyAttempts: We're receiving a lot of requests right now. Please try again later.

Permission.photos: Can't access photo library. Ensure that this is enabled in settings.
Permission.notifs: Can't register notifications. Ensure that this is enabled in settings.
Permission.camera: Can't take a photo. Ensure that this is enabled in settings.

IntroContactScreen.welcomePost: Time to locate your loved one.

IssuesDetailScreen.awesomeThanksForUsingOurService: Awesome! Thanks for using our service :)
IssuesDetailScreen.weWillCheckInTwoDays: We'll check in with you again in two days.
IssuesDetailScreen.whatsUp: Can you tell us more about what happened?
IssuesDetailScreen.weHopeYoullSendAnotherLetter: We hope you'll send another letter soon!
IssuesDetailScreen.yourLetterIsOnItsWay: Your letter is on its way to your loved one! If you have questions in the meantime, reach out to us at support@ameelio.org
IssuesDetailScreen.IHaventAskedMyLovedOne: I haven't asked my loved one!
IssuesDetailScreen.theyHaventReceivedLetter: They haven't received the letter yet
IssuesDetailScreen.wantToCheckWithFacility: Would you like to check with
IssuesDetailScreen.waitCoupleDays: Sometimes letters will be delayed at the facility. Click below to call and check in on your letter, or wait a couple more days.
IssuesDetailScreen.tryMessagingUsOnFacebook: Try messaging us on Facebook. We're here to answer your questions, so ask away! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

ReferFriendsScreen.thanksAgain: Due to Covid, USPS is taking longer than usual to deliver our mail. Thank you for trusting us!

RegisterScreen.privacyText: We value your privacy. We will only use your address information as the return address for the mailed letter.
RegisterScreen.referrer: How did you hear about Ameelio?
RegisterScreen.passwordInvalid: The password must be at least 8 characters.

UpdateContactScreen.deleteWarning1: Once you delete the contact, you won't be able to recover it ever again. The history of all letters to

SupportFAQScreen.cancelMyLetter: I want to delete my letter
SupportFAQScreen.notYetArrived: I sent my letter more than 6 days ago and it hasn't arrived at the facility yet
SupportFAQScreen.wrongMailingAddress: I put the wrong mailing address
SupportFAQScreen.wrongReturnAddress: I put the wrong return address
SupportFAQScreen.wouldLikeTrackingNumber: I would like the USPS tracking number
SupportFAQScreen.talkToAmeelio: I want to talk to someone at Ameelio

SupportFAQDetailScreen.cancelMyLetter1: Sorry to hear that. Unfortunately, we cannot cancel letters after they are sent
SupportFAQDetailScreen.cancelMyLetter2: Letters are immediately sent to our printers after you submit and they are already on their way.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.notYetArrived: Due to COVID-19, USPS is experiencing temporary delays in delivery. We’ll report your problem to the service provider and we appreciate your patience during this time. We are trying our best to ensure the letter gets to your recipient soon.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.wrongMailingAddress: Sorry to hear that! We won’t be able to edit the address for this letter since it’s already on the way, but you can easily update your loved one’s address to make sure they get the next ones!
SupportFAQDetailScreen.wrongReturnAddress: We’re sorry to hear that! To update your return address, you can update your profile here.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.trackingNumber: Each letter sent through our platform has a unique barcode that gets scanned by USPS as it travels through the mail stream. However, we do not have access to the specific USPS tracking number at this time.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.trackingError: We’re sorry to hear that! Please reach out to us so we can help you figure out what went wrong.
SupportFAQDetailScreen.talkToAmeelio: We’re happy to talk and we’d be more than glad to help however we can!

Prompts.prompt1: How are things going with your life? Any milestones lately?
Prompts.prompt2: What was the best part of your day today?
Prompts.prompt3: Have you watched any interesting movies or TV shows lately?
Prompts.prompt4: Describe a dream trip you would like to take with your loved one in the future
Prompts.prompt5: Recall a fond memory with your loved one and describe it to him/her
Prompts.prompt6: Send a picture from an exciting day that you spent together and talk about it
Prompts.prompt7: Write about what you love most about your loved one
Prompts.prompt8: Include an uplifting poem and talk about how it makes you feel
Prompts.prompt9: Talk about a news article that you read recently and what you learned from it
Prompts.prompt10: Talk about a movie or TV show that made you laugh recently
Prompts.prompt11: Write the first verse of a song and challenge your loved one to write the next verse
Prompts.prompt12: Send your loved one an excerpt from a book and have them guess the book's ending
Prompts.prompt13: Choose a color to describe your mood and explain why you picked that color to your loved one
Prompts.prompt14: Send your loved one a picture of you from when you were younger and ask them to guess how old you are there
Prompts.prompt15: Write about a bible verse (or a verse from any other religious text) that you recently read and what it means to you
Prompts.prompt16: Write about something you did/saw today that reminded you of your loved one
Prompts.prompt17: Ask your loved one 10 questions, answer them yourself, and have him/her answer them
Prompts.prompt18: Send your loved one a playlist of all of the songs you are listening to right now

Alert.weNeedProfilePermission: We need your permission to upload a profile photo
Alert.weNeedNotificationsPermission: We need your permission to send notifications
Alert.goToSettingsToUpdate: Go to settings to update your permissions
Alert.mustUsePhysical: You must use a physical device to receive push notifications
Alert.fillAllImages: You must choose an image for each slot in the layout to continue

Compose.psYourLovedOneWillRespondTo: P.S. Your loved ones will be able to respond to you via the return address:
Compose.placeholder: Tell your loved one about something you did / saw today that reminded you of them!
Compose.warningCantCancel: Warning: your letters cannot be cancelled once sent.
Compose.postcardMustHaveContent: You have to select a photo.
Compose.letterInProgress: You have a draft in progress
Compose.continueWritingAnd: Continue writing and send that draft to your loved one
Compose.draftContactDeleted: The contact that your saved draft was addressed to has been deleted. You'll have to start a new draft.
Compose.firstLetterGhostTextBody: hope you're good. I am trying out this new service to see if it works.
Compose.noDesignSelected: No design selected. Tap below to get started.
Compose.iWouldLikeToSend: I would like to send something:
Compose.dueToTDCJ: Due to a TDCJ policy, loved ones in Texas state prisons are not allowed to receive postcards. Only
Compose.havingTroubleWithCategories: We're having trouble loading the available categories. You can still send Personal letters and photos, but may want to check your wifi and try again to load our postcard library.

Sharing.message: Hey! I've been using Ameelio to send FREE photos, letters and postcards to my incarcerated loved one.  You can try it out here:
Sharing.title: Ameelio: Free Photos and Letters to Prison
Sharing.subjectLine: Send free letters and photos to prison!
